examples: A further 300 people have taken refuge in the US embassy.
Otras 300 personas se han refugiado en la embajada de Estados Unidos.
The region was a place of refuge for outlaws and bandits.
La región era un lugar de refugio para forajidos y bandidos.
They were forced to seek refuge from the fighting.
Se vieron obligados a buscar refugio de los combates.
As the situation at home got worse she increasingly took refuge in her work.
A medida que la situación en casa empeoraba, se refugiaba cada vez más en su trabajo.
